src.data package¶

Submodules¶

src.data.make_dataset module¶

make_dataset.py¶

This package read the original data from kaggle located in the data/raw directory and write it into the data/processed so we dont manipulate the original data

src.data.make_dataset.main()[source]¶

Retrieves data raw (../raw) into data ready to be analyzed (saved in ../processed).
